com.example.android

Class UserInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.UserInfo

  • public class UserInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that represents the data of the user that has logged into the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected UserInfo()
      NOT FOR USE! Exists only to prevent instantiation.

        public void setIntegerId(int id)
        Sets value of user integerId.
        Parameters:
        id - The user's integer id

        public java.lang.String getFbToken()
        Retrieves user fbToken. If UserInfo wasn't initialized, returns default value.

        Retrieves user appServerToken. If UserInfo wasn't initialized, returns default value.

      • wasInitialized

        public java.lang.Boolean wasInitialized()
        Returns true if the UserInfo was already initialized, or false otherwise.

      • isDriver

        public java.lang.Boolean isDriver()
        Returns true if the user is a driver, or false otherwise.

      • getCars

        public java.util.ArrayList<CarInfo> getCars()
        Retrieves user list of cars. If UserInfo wasn't initialized, returns default value.

        Retrieves user UserStatus. If UserInfo wasn't initialized, returns default value.

      • setUserStatus

        public void setUserStatus(UserStatus status)
        Sets the user UserStatus to the received value.
        Parameters:
        status - UserStatus to use for the user.

      • infoWillChange

        public java.lang.Boolean infoWillChange(java.lang.String mailNew,
                                        java.lang.String nameNew,
                                        java.lang.String surnameNew,
                                        java.lang.String idNew,
                                        java.lang.String birthdateNew,
                                        java.lang.String countryNew)
        Returns true if the UserInfo struct will change if it were updated with the fields received (i.e. returns true if any of the parameters received is different from the current on the UserInfo struct).

      • setAsDriver

        public void setAsDriver(java.util.ArrayList<CarInfo> newCarsList)
        Sets the current user as driver instead of passenger. Basically a role change. if newCarsList is not null, also updates the user cars' list.
        Parameters:
        newCarsList - ArrayList of the CarInfo to set to the driver

      • seppuku

        public void seppuku()
        Destroys all the current UserInfo information. After this call, UserInfo will behave like if it was never initiliazed.

        public OtherUsersInfo getOtherUser()
